alert.note: Alert for Cannon; De Kalb; Putnam; Rutherford; Smith; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 1:17PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Smith, De Kalb, east central Rutherford, southeastern Wilson, west central Putnam and Cannon Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 117 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Brush Creek to near Murfreesboro. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Smithville, Woodbury, Watertown, Baxter, Gordonsville, Hickman, Alexandria, Dowelltown, Liberty, Auburntown, Lascassas, Center Hill Lake, Bradyville, Edgar Evans State Park, Milton and Readyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 252 and 281. Interstate 24 between mile markers 77 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cannon; De Kalb; Putnam; Rutherford; Smith; Wilson
